response.overview: Pursuing milk and Zyns, Chloe and their son, Big Pimpin,’ become lost amidst a boone-blizzard. Chloe can find their boobs in their snoveralls, but will Ski Patrol be able to find Chloe in the 3 inches of pow pow? Or has god forsaken them, yo?  “Utterly confusing” –NYTimes Magazine “This is cinema. Take a seat, Jack London, it’s our turn now” –DailyWire
response.tagline: Boone, Blizzards, Boobs: A Tale of Persistence and Obsession
response.title: SKI PATROLLL 2: The Snoveralls
